entities.name: ginn
entities.description: Ginny is a character in the story who has been possessed by You-Know-Who (Voldemort) before. She mentions that when she was possessed, she couldn't remember what she had been doing for hours at a time.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story who has been having strange dreams and is concerned about being possessed by You-Know-Who (Voldemort).

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a character in the story who tries to reassure Harry that he is not possessed by You-Know-Who (Voldemort). She mentions that Harry had flashes of what Voldemort was up to last year.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: You-Know-Who (Voldemort) is a character in the story who has possessed Ginny and other characters before. He is also known as the main antagonist of the story.

entities.name: snake
entities.description: The snake is an object that appears in Harry's dream. It is mentioned that Harry was inside the snake and it felt like he was the snake.

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about being possessed by You-Know-Who (Voldemort), but Ginny reassures him that he is not possessed.
Ginny has been possessed by You-Know-Who (Voldemort) before, and she mentions the symptoms of possession that she experienced.
